title: I completed my daily mission and got no reward
body: I played the game and won before the timer was done and won after the timer for daily mission ended. says completed but I didn't get anything.

replies.body: I'm guessing you were finally able to get that mission completed because I'm not seeing any active missions on your account right now. Let me know if you saw it complete or not though!

Restart your client. Or restart your computer. Then open notifications / mission. You have to actually "see" the mission for it to complete sometimes. It is weird and I reported it before, but I doubt it got to the right people.
I did all of that and nothing has changed in the slightest.
I also cant open my notifications anymore has anyone had this problem before??
